attributes.value: Values artwork
Values independence
Sees working hard as a foolish waste of time
Values sacrifice
Respects perseverance
Is prone to strong feelings of lust
Is confident under pressure
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Drops any activity at the slightest hint of difficulty or even the suggestion of effort being required
Dislikes receiving advice, preferring to keep her own counsel
Has great trouble mastering fear when confronted by danger
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Always presents herself as extravagantly as possible, displaying a magnificent image to the world
Is very rarely moved by curiosity
Tends to be swayed by the emotions of others
Dislikes abstract discussions and would much rather focus on practical examples
Quick to tire
A sharp intellect
Poor focus
A way with words
A feel for music
Poor empathy
